thoughts.text: I see a few interesting files in the list_files output, so I will use the read_file command to read their contents and see if they contain any useful information.
thoughts.reasoning: Reading the contents of interesting files can help me gain a better understanding of the environment and what resources are available to me.

- Take notes on any useful information found
